original: 對吳地軍民施以信義、陸抗生病送藥，連敵人都敬服。病逝後，百姓感念建羊公碑，武帝流淚、百姓流淚...
text: The army and civilians of Wudi were given Xinyi, Lu Kang was sick and delivered medicine, even the enemy obeyed it. After the death of the disease, the people were grateful for the construction of the Yang Gong monument, Emperor Wu shed tears, and the people shed tears...
